scripts.docker-build: docker=$(command -v docker); [ -z "$docker" ] && docker=$(command -v podman); [ -z "$docker" ] && echo 'Please install docker or podman to proceed' && exit; $docker ps | grep tbela99/criticalpath | awk '{print $1}' | xargs $docker stop;rm -rf ./src/node_modules; $docker build --squash -t tbela99/critical . && $docker run -p 3000:3000 tbela99/critical
